title: Dangerous Beauty Font
content:
Can anyone please help me ID both the title and tagline fonts?

[http://www.impawards.com/1998/posters/dangerous\_beauty.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090912054622/http:/www.impawards.com/1998/posters/dangerous_beauty.jpg "http://www.impawards.com/1998/posters/dangerous\_beauty.jpg")
author: Yorickfinn

comments.content:
Title is Traaajaaan. (See my avatar.)

Tagline is ... too small.
